storyInfo: Nuova Volsinii prepares for the Carnevale to celebrate its first anniversary. While City Hall releases a promotional video and citizens prepare masks and costumes, mayor-elect Leontuzzo is caught in a car accident.

attributes.content: <p=2>November 5th, 1100    8:10 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Is everybody here?
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Look behind you. The whole street belongs to us... an awe-inspiring pack of wolves.
attributes.name: Excited Mafioso

attributes.content: Good. No one should miss the Carnevale.
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: The weapons?
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: The secret weapon caches have been opened by the Don's orders. Guns, bombs, staves, crossbows... everything is fair game.
attributes.name: Excited Mafioso

attributes.content: Good! But remember the most important thing—keep your mask on.
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Nobody cares who's behind the mask, which famiglia they're from. Nothing you do will be punished.
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Carnevale—Siracusa's greatest festival!
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Cut down our foes! All the famiglie that oppose us will be swept aside! Nothing shall stand in our way in Siracusa!
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: What about the officials of the city hall? They're even worse than the other famiglie, those slugs that keep babbling about their lofty ideals.
attributes.name: Excited Mafioso

attributes.content: The courthouse is right there behind us. They can sit and watch in that proud white tower of theirs... or get a crossbow bolt in their throat if they don't behave.
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: I like the sound of that!
attributes.name: Excited Mafioso

attributes.content: Do you smell it in the wind? It's the smell of blood, just waiting for a chance to spill...
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Tonight, there is no Grey Hall, there are no laws, no rules, no order. Tomorrow, there will be a new order in Siracusa, starting with this new city—
attributes.name: Fanatical Mafioso

attributes.content: Alright, I think the speech has gone on for long enough.
I'm—er... Noemi! Trainee officer at the Nuova Volsinii Police Department!
Look around you! There is nowhere to run!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: According to the New Urban Management Act, even members of the Dodici Famiglie must undergo a background check and standard registration prior to entering Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Your previous acts of violence are on record, and the violence that you are planning will not go unpunished. Illegal ownership and usage of weapons is a serious crime!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Where do you think you are? Here, er, *ahem*...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii has no place for famiglie!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Cut!
attributes.name: Off Screen

attributes.content: I thought I had it all memorized. I don't know why...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: There are only a few days until the Carnevale, Noemi. We need to finish this soon.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: Sorry, I didn't think that my first task as a trainee would be shooting a movie...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Are you nervous because of the camera, or because the scene in front of you looks real?
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: If it's the former—look at these blokes here. I'm nervous that they'll let slip the names of their favorite pizzerias while trying to say their lines.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: I worked at my papa's pizzeria before I started police school...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Anyway, you look good on screen and have a decent memory. You're the best one for the job.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: If it's the latter—you're a graduate of Siracusa's first police academy. You're gonna have to stare into the eyes of the wise guys at some point. It's your job.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: B-Both, I guess...
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: I promised Papa that I'd finish my training and become a cop. I'll get my job done, whatever it is!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Please let me have another go!
attributes.name: Noemi

attributes.content: Alright, Venezians, here we go for another take.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: *Moan*—
attributes.name: Mafiosi Extras

attributes.content: 3, 2, 1, action!
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: ...What do you think?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: What answer would you like to hear?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Maybe the actors playing the mafiosi should act more intimidating? Show just how far Nuova Volsinii has come?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Or maybe you don't like how Venezia Trucking is involved in the filming? But at least they have not attempted to challenge Nuova Volsinii's New Urban Management Act.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: They're just providing 'employees' as extras. They didn't even ask for ad space in the promotional video...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You know I'm not doing this because I like it.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I don't know, you look pretty happy in the limelight.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signore! It's almost time to shoot your speech!
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: Be right there!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I-I'll make sure they know I'm just the Acting Mayor...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Not for long, though.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: A grand festival, formal inauguration as mayor, a promotional video, your face in every corner of the city, so that no one would miss it...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We've talked about this, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We've done a lot in this new city. We've founded a new city hall, enacted the New Urban Management Act, and put into place policies that exclude the mafioso order...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But we have yet to face the big questions head-on—from Signora Sicilia, and the other famiglie that have designs on the new city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Is there a better time than now?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Here, at the one-year anniversary of Nuova Volsinii, we have invited all citizens, even friends from abroad, to come to Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: We have revived the word Carnevale, which has not been used in the last half-century, and given it new meaning, in order to demonstrate...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: This country can and will change the old things that bind it, and it starts with this city.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: But how will painting a target on your back contribute to all that you've said?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We need a banner...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: And the famiglie of Siracusa are waiting for a target that they can attack and harm.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Just because the famiglie have kept a low profile doesn't mean they've given up on controlling this city. They have their eyes on you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...I'm not afraid of them.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I won't let them have their way, not again...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I know how you feel, Leon, but what we need right now is not a reckless declaration of war.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You need to protect yourself. I don't want to see you...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Signore! Are you ready?
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: C-Coming!
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The trucks will have to be returned to the union as soon as the shooting is done. They're needed for the festival preparations.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I know, half a day is as much as the union can give us. Don't worry, it's all been arranged.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I need to go. A lot to do at the courts.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Is there trouble?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Nothing major. Some issues with a few companies' registrations.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Their nose for loopholes in the law would put my law school classmates to shame.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: About dinner—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: There's leftover pasta in the fridge. Help yourself.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: No... what I mean is...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I promised to join Demetri for dinner tonight... I can't avoid him forever.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Take care of yourself, Leon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Keep an eye on the camera's indicator light, Signore. We can begin when you're ready.
attributes.name: Director

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Good evening, citizens.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: It is my honor to speak to you today as a citizen of Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.text: \n\nWelcome to a new era for Siracusa.

attributes.content: H-Here!
attributes.name: Apprentice Tailor

attributes.content: I had to walk five blocks and stand in a queue to buy this salami. And this wine is the best from Nonno's collection... he's not in any shape to drink anymore.
attributes.name: Apprentice Tailor

attributes.content: Good, little tailor, you're a good kid.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: There's so little to do at night in Nuova Volsinii. In the old days, on a night like this... hehe.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: (Cocky whistling)
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: (Awkward whistling)
attributes.name: Apprentice Tailor

attributes.content: Eh, cut it out, Luchino! It's so damn dumb.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: I warned you last time when you tried to show off the jargon you learned from movies—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Imitating a mafioso doesn't make you one. Besides... just get real, and stick to tailoring.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: ...Yes sir.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Alright, you got your wine and salami. I got to go.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Going already? Thought you'd be pestering us for stories about the famiglia again.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Nonno found out that I was hanging out with you. He doesn't want—
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Ha! And you want to be somebody?
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: What are you doing outside, Luchino?
The cops are stepping up their patrols ahead of the Carnevale. Don't let them catch you roaming on the streets.
...Nonno's calling.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: That old man—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Everybody respected us and feared us back in the day. Now we're letting an old tailor like Umberto walk all over us.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Sure, follow the rules of wherever you end up, but the rule of Nuova Volsinii is to throw all the old rules out.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Even big famiglie with a seat in the Grey Hall, like the Saluzzo, have to keep their tail firmly between their legs here... how times have changed.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: 'Saluzzo'...
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Er, I'm going in.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: N-Nonno.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: ...The suit's already packed. You remember where to deliver it to, right?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: Come back right away if the customer doesn't have any requests after trying it on.
attributes.name: Umberto
Umberto
attributes.content: I know this is a special client, and I know you've always wanted to meet the 'real VIPs'.

attributes.name: Umberto
attributes.content: *Cough*—
attributes.joined: I know this is a special client, and I know you've always wanted to meet the 'real VIPs'.*Cough*—

attributes.content: I know, I know, you've said it many times.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.content: I'll get your medicine on the way and come back as soon as I've made the delivery. Don't worry, just get some rest.
attributes.name: Luchino

attributes.text: \n\nSlowly, but surely. We can all see it.
\n\nWe are taking back what should have been ours all along. Our lives, our courage.
The burden of history weighs heavy. Sometimes, we find our feet mired in the past.
\n\nBut we will keep walking. We will never stop.

attributes.content: <p=2>November 5th, 1100    9:37 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I came here first! You're cutting the line!
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: Which company do you represent, sir?
attributes.name: Famiglia Company Employee

attributes.content: I... I'm with the Truckers' Union. I have important documents that I need Judge Lavinia to take care of today. I have an appointment with her!
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: How important? Will it bring hundreds of millions of florins in investments to Nuova Volsinii?
attributes.name: Famiglia Company Employee

attributes.content: Well, no...
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: Then it's nothing particularly urgent.
attributes.name: Famiglia Company Employee

attributes.content: I suggest that you remain patient while important business is being discussed behind those doors, involving numbers that you cannot even fathom.
attributes.name: Famiglia Company Employee

attributes.content: That's the biggest contribution you can make to the city.
attributes.name: Famiglia Company Employee

attributes.content: I must remind you, Judge Lavinia, that the law is founded upon the principle of fairness, and no one should receive special treatment.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: It is difficult not to suspect that you frequently target companies under the Saluzzo banner out of your own prejudice against us.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Did you say prejudice?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It is past nine in the evening, signore. Did you think I volunteered to do overtime, unpaid, and go through the ordeal of sitting in a room with you, just so I could satisfy my 'prejudice'?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Here is Saluzzo Vino's previous submission for their new winery, which lists one hundred and thirty security personnel.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Here is the revised submission, which instead lists thirty logistics personnel, fifty winemakers, and fifty technical personnel.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You don't have to respect me, signore, but the least you could do is respect the New Urban Management Act, and have a modicum of common sense.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...What will it take for you to stop breathing down our necks?
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Easy. Nuova Volsinii welcomes any honest business with open arms, but there is no place here for any dishonest famiglia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Saluzzo can sell his wine to Leithanien, Columbia, even Ursus for all I care...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But not a single shelf in Nuova Volsinii will carry wine bearing the label of Saluzzo's new winery until it passes the qualification audit.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll give it to you, Judge Lavinia. Not one government or court employee has dared talk to us like this in the entire history of Siracusa.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: The law of Nuova Volsinii bends for no one.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Get used to it, or things are only going to get harder for you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I've already wasted too much time with Saluzzo wines today, signore. Kindly remove yourself from my office, and remove your men from the door, because they're in the way of that lady outside.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I heard the impertinence that you showed towards her. She deserves an apology.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Hmph.
attributes.name: Famiglia Lawyer

attributes.content: Good evening, Judge Lavinia! Sorry to take up your time, but please, take a look at this!
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: It's the dispatch record of the Truckers' Union in recent days, recording the driver, cargo, route, and time of every dispatch.
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: There's so much that it took quite a while to put together... I would like you to review it.
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: Thanks. It's very detailed... but why are you asking me to review it?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You said logistics around the Carnevale is really important, and to be on guard of smugglers...
attributes.name: Anxious Truck Driver

attributes.content: Yes, but it was just a reminder... besides, you're the president of the Truckers' Union, Eirene. You can make your own judgment.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh... you recognize me?
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: It's not like we haven't met before... the most diligent driver in Nuova Volsinii, and the most trusted leader of the Nuova Volsinii Freight Workers and Truck Drivers Mutual Aid Association.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's always going to be just 'Truckers' Union' to us...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Without workers and drivers like you, there would be no Nuova Volsinii. You should all be proud of yourselves.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: T-Thank you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I'll take the report. Thank you for your vigilance; I trust your judgment... is there anything else?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Well... the list of new truck drivers that we submitted last week hasn't been approved yet.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I would like to provide my assurance for one of the names on the list...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You understand, Eirene, why we're very thorough about background checks for truck drivers...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Of course! I know... logistics is very important to Nuova Volsinii. We can't give the famiglie a chance to get their foot in!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: A Reproba from Ursus with almost no social relations and whose past is virtually unknown... You do see my concern, right?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I promise, she has nothing to do with the mafia. And she's a great driver!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Her resume is like this because she's had some hard luck... she really, really needs a job right now!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I'm thinking, Judge Lavinia... the laws of Nuova Volsinii protect us from the mafia. When our citizens need help, perhaps...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Oh, I don't mean to pressure you! You should deal with it whatever way you see fit—
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You're too wound up, Eirene.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I can see that you're trying to keep your distance from me.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I, I really like you and Signor Bellone, Judge Lavinia, I really do!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Hehe, thanks.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Same for Sommer.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer? The driver who came with you to Nuova Volsinii? The one always with a lighter in his hand...
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: You remember! He's my best friend.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: We came to Nuova Volsinii a year ago. Back then, City Hall's notice about the Truckers' Union had been up for half a month, but no one dared to apply, fearing mafia reprisals.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Sommer and I read it a few times and were about to leave when you and Signor Bellone stopped us.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: You stood before the notice longer than anyone else.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...We came because we couldn't stay in Sicilia.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I remember what you said to me... I, I don't mean to make this awkward, but my life would be very different without you.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I know you don't want the famiglie—I mean, 'companies' to interfere in Nuova Volsinii's logistics, and I know they haven't given up on it.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: The result, however, is that the Truckers' Union has become the only legal transportation organization, and it is growing by the day...
attributes.name: Eirene
Eirene
attributes.content: All our drivers have something in their past that they're not proud of, before they came to Nuova Volsinii...

attributes.name: Eirene
attributes.content: Anyway, we're all looking for a fresh start, a second chance.
attributes.joined: All our drivers have something in their past that they're not proud of, before they came to Nuova Volsinii...Anyway, we're all looking for a fresh start, a second chance.

attributes.content: That's why you don't want to be seen to be too close to City Hall or the courts.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...Yes.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I know, there are many things that will take time to get there.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But I promise you that the mafia will never get a foothold in the Truckers' Union.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: And I voted for Signor Bellone when he ran for mayor! Everyone can see how well he’s done as Acting Mayor for the past year. I'm sure—*grumble*.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Haven't had dinner yet?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I'm fine! I'm not hungry yet...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: I still have some pizza here, if you don't mind that it's gotten a little cold.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I-I can't possibly...
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Think of it as helping me out. It's too much for me to finish on my own, and we can't very well talk about work on an empty stomach, can we?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Besides, there is no greater crime in Siracusa than letting good, authentic pizza go to waste.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: If you put it that way... I guess it would be rude to refuse.
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Tell me more about the present state of the Truckers' Union, Eirene.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Oh, uh... okay!
attributes.name: Eirene

attributes.content: Average pizza sauce last month is up five times from the previous months...
attributes.name: Eirene
Eirene
attributes.content: Oh, I mean, dispatches...

attributes.name: Eirene
attributes.content: And this pizza sauce is really good.
attributes.joined: Oh, I mean, dispatches...And this pizza sauce is really good.

attributes.content: Maybe we should finish our dinner first.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.text: A friend once said something that really left an impression on me—
\n\n'Our power comes from the very lives we have created.'
\n\nOur power will protect all that we have built.

attributes.content: That's the fifth slice of pizza and third glass of juice that you just eliminated. Are you that hungry?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Shut up and drink this espresso.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: It's so damn sour!
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: If we screw up this mission because this swill makes me throw up, whose head am I gonna give the boss, yours?
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Live with it. I just picked it up off the shelf.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Nobody uses this frontage road anyway. Besides, it's just transporting a bunch of 'tires', what could go wrong?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: No need to get all worked up about an unimportant job like this.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm tired of listening to your complaints for the past two months, Gambino.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Haven't you figured out our new boss yet? Trying too hard to show off in front of him will only have the opposite effect.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Fresh meat like us, we gotta be patient and wait for our chance.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Well, ain't you the model employee, Capone.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I thought you would at least show a little bit of, I don't know, shame? There's hardly any place for a Sicilian in Siracusa these days.
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: I'm not Sicilian anymore. It's your shame, not mine.
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: I just want to get my Nuova Volsinii citizenship sooner rather than later. All the work I put in over the past six months, all the guarantee money I paid, and I'm only halfway to the required points—
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Halfway?! You've got fifty more points than I do? Have you been doing—*gasp*—community service while I wasn't looking?
attributes.name: Gambino

attributes.content: Shut your crap, Gambino. We're on our last chance and you know it.
attributes.name: Capone
Capone
attributes.content: Keep your eyes sharp on the street. It should be coming any time now—

attributes.name: Capone
attributes.content: You got any pizza left? Give me one.
Cazzo, it's cold, how do you even manage to eat this...
attributes.name: Capone

attributes.content: Ach... I'm late.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: You're late, Leon.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: I'm sorry, it's been a really busy day.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Still working on your inaugural speech?
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Well, that too... We're planning a birthday party for an entire city. It's not quite the same as planning a party at home, is it?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: I'm surprised... you still remember.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Of course I do. Did you think I was going to forget how you bought ginger ale instead of beer for the banquet, and pocketed the difference to buy a car?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Well, I guess that DID happen.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: You sound... distracted, Demetri.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Do I? It's nothing. I guess it's been too long since we last saw each other.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Take care on your way, Leon.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Might have taken that as a threat, if we weren't in Nuova Volsinii.
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Enough joking and hurry up. I'm waiting at the seat by the window.
attributes.name: Voice on the Phone

attributes.content: Leontuzzo hangs up.
He has not seen the man on the other end of the phone for a year now. He knows what he wants and how to decline his offer.
Leontuzzo shakes his head at the thought of the reunion, which promises to be a less-than-pleasant one.
A beam of light shines on his face.
What the—who drives like that?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Wait, that vehicle—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Hey, what's going on with my steering wheel—
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Keep your distance! It's dangerous!
Out of the way! Make way for the stretcher!
Signore! Can you hear me?
Hang in there! The ambulance is almost here!
Where... am... I...
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: Stay still, signore! You've lost a lot of blood—
Who is... that...?
attributes.name: Leontuzzo

attributes.content: The last thing Leontuzzo remembers before he loses consciousness is a blurry yellow silhouette—
A taxi.
The Carnevale has brought countless visitors from Siracusa and beyond to Nuova Volsinii.
This taxi does not seem different from any other that carries visitors across the city.
Except for the great, strange shadow that it wears.
Not cast by the towering buildings, nor a trick of the neon lights. It is the shadow of a wolf.
The taxi slithers through the city like a ghost, carrying a wolf from the wilderness.
Slower, Lappland.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: What? The ageless, deathless Signore dei Lupi, afraid of being thrown out of a car?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: It's your car I'm worried about. Keep driving it like this, and it'll fall apart.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: We managed to get it fixed when it was just a bunch of scrap metal lying out there in the wilderness. It's strong, trust it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Or do you not trust my driving skills? I don't fool around with my own life... except when necessary.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: You don't want the police to find you and throw you in jail, or the mafia to find you and throw you into a meat grinder, do you? At least, not yet.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: We're getting better at reading each other's minds, Zaaro.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: We still have a Carnevale to go to, after all.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I thought you would scorn the Carnevale for lacking in revelry, seeing all the colorful lights and balloons that line the streets.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Of course not.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Carnevale had been a thing for centuries, dating back to when Siracusa was just a backwater province of Leithanien.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The Lupo of Siracusa found that they were still restless and uneasy, even after getting their own city, and the order of the famiglia.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: And so, for a few days in a year, the famiglie run amok in the city, settling scores, fighting over territory, or simply engaging in wanton violence.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Assault, arson, robbery, murder—everything was fair game as long as you had your mask on.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: The first thing Signora Sicilia did when she came to power was to abolish the festival, but Nuova Volsinii has persuaded her to permit its revival.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: They hope that reviving the festival without the brutality and cruelty would give this blank slate of a city new meaning, and a sense of belonging for the people who have come to seek out a new life.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Is that not Carnevale—a wonderful thing?
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: Have we gotten into poetry now? Your showmanship is beyond mortal help, Lappland.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Just excited about it.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I promise that the reborn festival will be an unforgettable one for everyone—the Lupi included.
attributes.name: Lappland

attributes.content: I hope you remember our agreement. This round is coming to a close. Do not disappoint me, Lappland.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: As I said, our battle will continue for thousands upon thousands of years.
attributes.name: Zaaro

attributes.content: Well, strap in, and hang on—
attributes.name: Lappland
